GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves specified article, includes comment count, does not include body

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments from a specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to article in URL, body contains username and comment body

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments votes on specified article by amount specified in body

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified comment, responds with 204
